content:
As an AI language model, I don't have access to the latest information on RADA's programs and resources, but they have a dedicated department to support their alumni called RADAdvantage. RADAdvantage offers various services to their alumni, such as:

1. Industry networking events and mentoring opportunities with established professionals.

2. Career development workshops and training sessions to improve job-seeking skills.

3. Promotion of alumni work and projects through the RADAdvantage blog and social media.

4. Access to its facilities, including its library, archives and professional development opportunities.

5. Financial support and guidance for alumni setting up their own theatre and film companies.

These programs and resources aim to help RADA alumni develop and nurture their careers in theatre, film and TV.
